data.title: Western Kentucky University Athletics
data.meta_description: Jack Edelen (15) Guard - FRESHMAN (2023-24): Appeared in 27 games for the Hilltoppers in 2023-24, averaging 8.9 minutes per game... Averaged 1.2 assists, 1.0...
data.text:
FRESHMAN (2023-24): Appeared in 27 games for the Hilltoppers in 2023-24, averaging 8.9 minutes per game... Averaged 1.2 assists, 1.0 point, and 0.6 rebounds per game... Saw a season high in minutes in the CUSA Tournament Semifinal game vs. Middle Tennessee on March 15... Gathered 2 rebounds and 1 assist facing MTSU... Posted a season-high 7 points on the road at Wichita State on Nov. 9... Logged 12 minutes and shot a perfect 2-for-2 from the field while accounting for 4 points, 2 rebounds and 3 assists in the Tops' NCAA Tournament First-Round matchup vs. Marquette on March 22... Helped the Hilltoppers to their first NCAA tournament appearance and conference title since 2013

HIGH SCHOOL: Played at Louisville Male HS... Led his team to a Sweet 16 appearance in his senior year... Led the Bulldogs in scoring his senior season with 17.4 points per game... Played at Male his junior and senior years, becoming a 1,000-point scorer and making 150 3-pointers for the Bulldogs

HILLTOPPERS TO WEAR NUMBER 15:

Patrick Murphy (2020-21)

Darius Thompson (2018)

Tyler Miller (2017)
